channel.title: Problem with login Galkons Base
channel.description:
Hey! I'm using the client of Galkons Base, but when I try to login, I can only type my username... When I try to click on the field, where I can enter my password, nothing happens, the cursor will still stand on username... So I can only enter usernames, and I want that fixed. :(
Can someone help me please? :) Thanks in advance, Allard

item.title: Problem with login Galkons Base
item.dc:creator: @Zederation Zederation
item.description:
@Zederation wrote:

OK, press enter on the keyboard, and start typing a password (Note the cursor will not be able to be seen)

Read full topic

item.title: Problem with login Galkons Base
item.dc:creator: @Allardx Allardx
item.description:
@Allardx wrote:

Hey!
I’m using the client of Galkons Base, but when I try to login, I can only type my username…
When I try to click on the field, where I can enter my password, nothing happens, the cursor will still stand on username…
So I can only enter usernames, and I want that fixed.

Can someone help me please?
Thanks in advance,
Allard
